languageKey.label: What to display
Select the views you need
Google Maps Key
You need to have a Google Maps Key. Put it into the Extension Manager if you just need one. It is domain specific and you get it at http://code.google.com/apis/maps/signup.html
Available categories
Select all categories which are available in the frontend.
Active categories
All POIs whose category is selected are displayed on the map.
Define the pages on which the records are saved.
Define the depth of the page tree which is used to get the records.
Longtidude & Latidude for the map after loading
Zoom Level
1 is far far away, 13 is very near
Map Types

Select the map types you want to display.
Use Mapnik and T@H for alternative map types which are open source and which you can extend yourself. More information at http://www.openstreetmap.org
Let the user switch map types.
Show a dynmic list of records which are currently displayed on the map.
Enter the UID of the record you want to show on default. If you are using more than one table you need to add the tablename too like tt_news:123
